event.title: Talk at "Nexell informiert", Zurich, Switzerland
event.body: The president of FSFE, Georg Greve, will give a lecture titled "Free Software in your daily business: What is free Software?" during the "Nexell informiert", in Zurich. The lecture is starting on 4 December at 17:30 at "Schweizerisches Institut für Betriebsökonomie". "Nexell informiert" is a meeting where experts are invited to talk and spread awareness about Free Software issues, organised by the Nexell, an independent team of international and multilingual CRM professionals, there to help customers find the right technologies, platforms and solutions to meet their needs and budgets.
